paper_abstract: We give an improved analysis of the simple D-2-sampling based PTAS for the k-means clustering problem given by Jaiswal et al. [3]. The improvement on the running time is from O (nd . 2((O) over tilde) ((k2/epsilon))) to O (nd . 2((O) over tilde) ((k/epsilon))). (C) 2014 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Improved analysis of D-2-sampling based PTAS for k-means and other clustering problems
